Its hotel provides guest rooms and suites, as well as various facilities and amenities, which include Internet, meeting rooms, banquet ballrooms, gym and fitness center, swimming pool, tennis courts, airport shuttle services, and others. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

SOST.summary: Southern States Sign Company owns and operates hotels and resorts. Southern States Sign Company was formerly known as Conte Rosso & Partners S.r.l. and changed its name to Southern States Sign Company in November 2012, due to a reverse merger transaction. The company is based in Rome, Italy.

SOTS.JK.summary: PT Satria Mega Kencana Tbk, through its subsidiaries, operates hotels under the Sotis brand in Indonesia. It also owns and leases real estate properties; and offers food and beverages. In addition, the company is involved in the professional, scientific, and technical activities, as well as construction services. Further, it provides spa services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

SST.F.summary: Heeton Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the hospitality business in Singapore, Thailand, Australia, Japan, Malaysia, Vietnam, and the United Kingdom. It operates through Hospitality, Property Investment, and Property Development segments. The company engages in the development and sale of private residential properties, as well as provides property management services. It also leases residential, retail, and commercial properties. In addition, the company owns, manages, and franchises hotels and related services; and provides administrative and management services. As of December 31, 2019, it operates 13 hotels. Heeton Holdings Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Singapore.

SSTY.L.summary: Safestay plc operates and develops traveler accommodation under the Safestay brand in the United Kingdom. It provides overnight hostel accommodation services and owns properties. The company serves families, backpackers, and business travelers. Safestay plc was incorporated in 2014 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.

STAY.summary: Extended Stay America, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, owns, operates, develops, and manages hotels in the United States. As of December 31, 2020, the company had a network of 646 hotels. It serves customers in the mid-priced extended stay segment. The company also licenses Extended Stay America brand to third-party franchisees. Extended Stay America, Inc. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina.

TAJGVK.NS.summary: TAJGVK Hotels & Resorts Limited owns, operates, and manages hotels, palaces, and resorts under the Taj brand in India. It operates Taj Krishna, a 5-star hotel with 260 rooms, Taj Banjara with 122 rooms, Taj Deccan with 151 rooms, and Vivanta by Taj, a five star hotel with 181 rooms in Hyderabad. The company also operates Taj Chandigarh with 149 rooms in Chandigarh; Taj Club House with 220 rooms in Chennai; and Taj Santacruz with 279 rooms in Mumbai. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

TEKTU.IS.long_name: Tek-Art Insaat Ticaret Turizm Sanayi ve Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi
TEKTU.IS.summary: Tek-Art Insaat Ticaret Turizm Sanayi ve Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi engages in the tourism business in Turkey and internationally. It invests, builds, and operates hotels, resorts, golf, restaurants, cafeterias, casinos and entertainment venues, beaches, amusement parks, marinas, yacht berths, tourist goods sales points, and regulation schools and related facilities. The company operates Club Zigana holiday village and Zigana Hotel resort. In addition, it offers tourism transport and car rental services, as well as acts as a travel agent. Further, the company operates stores, showrooms, and warehouses in ports and free zones. Tek-Art Insaat Ticaret Turizm Sanayi ve Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TGBHOTELS.NS.summary: TGB Banquets and Hotels Limited provides restaurant, banquet, and hotel services in India and internationally. It operates hotels under The Grand Bhagwati name in Ahmedabad. The company also offers dining under the CafÃ© Piano and Mr. & Mrs. Somani name; and catering services. In addition, it operates convention centers under The Grand Bhagwati name, as well as clubs and events. The company was formerly known as Bhagwati Banquets and Hotels Limited and changed its name to TGB Banquets and Hotels Limited in April 2013. TGB Banquets and Hotels Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.

TGO.JO.summary: Tsogo Sun Hotels Limited owns, leases, and manages hotels in South Africa. The company operates through four segments: Manco, Rental Income Â HPF, Internally Managed, and Offshore. The company operates hotels and resorts under the Southern Sun Hotels and Resorts, SunSquare, Garden Court, StayEasy, SUN1, hi Hotels brand names. It consists of a portfolio of 110 hotels. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.

ULAS.IS.long_name: Ulaslar Turizm Yatirimlari ve Dayanikli Tüketim Mallari Ticaret Pazarlama A.S.
ULAS.IS.summary: Ulaslar Turizm Yatirimlari ve Dayanikli TÃ¼ketim Mallari Ticaret Pazarlama A.S. operates a hotel in Turkey. Its hotel has 466 beds in 125 rooms and 41 suites. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

UTPYA.IS.long_name: Utopya Turizm Insaat Isletmecilik Ticaret A.S.
UTPYA.IS.summary: Utopya Turizm Insaat Isletmecilik Ticaret A.S. engages in the operation of tourism, hotel, and shopping mall businesses in Turkey. It operates Utopia World Hotel, a five-star hotel with 348 villa standard rooms, 194 main buildings with standard rooms, 4 deluxe rooms, 21 junior suites, 16 corner suites, 1 king suites, 1 queen suites, and 10 duplex rooms. The company also provides tourism agency services under the REC TRAVEL brand name, which includes ticket sales, reservations and sales of hotels, conferences and events, and vehicle and long-term fleet rental services. In addition, it engages in contracting activities for infrastructure, canal, sewer, and tunnel construction projects, as well as the production and sale of electricity. Further, the company is involved in the construction of public housing estates, commercial and shopping centers, factories, hotels, and holiday villages. Utopya Turizm Insaat Isletmecilik Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

VAC.PA.summary: Pierre et Vacances SA, through its subsidiaries, engages in the holiday accommodation and holiday property investment business. It operates through two segments, Property Development and Tourism. The Property Development engages in the land prospection, site design, construction, and marketing of holiday residences for individual buyers or institutional buyers primarily in France and internationally. The Tourism segment operates residences and villages marketed under the Pierre & Vacances, Center Parcs, Sunparks, Villages, Nature Paris, Maeva.com, and Adagio brands primarily in France, the Netherlands, Germany, Belgium, and Spain. As of September 30, 2020, it operated approximately 282 sites in Europe; 4 destinations across seaside, mountain, countryside, and city; and 45,801 apartments. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Paris, France. Pierre et Vacances SA is a subsidiary of SociÃ©tÃ© d'Investissement Touristique et Immobilier.

VICEROY.NS.summary: Viceroy Hotels Limited engages in the hoteliering business in India. The company owns, operates, franchises, and markets a 297 room hotel with restaurants and a convention center under the Marriott name; a 120 room hotel with banquet halls and fine dine restaurant under the Courtyard Marriott name; a 56 room budget hotel under the Minerva name; restaurants under the Minerva Coffee Shop name; and fine dine bars under the Bluefox name in Hyderabad and Vijayawada. It also operates Eat Street, a food court with Minerva Coffee Shop and other kiosks, as well as Waterfront fine dine restaurant. Viceroy Hotels Limited was founded in 1965 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

VRANDA-R.BK.summary: Veranda Resort Public Company Limited operates hotels and resorts in Thailand. The company operates its facilities under the Veranda Resort and Spa Hua Hin Cha Am, Veranda The High Resort Chiang Mai, Sofitel so Bangkok, Veranda Resort Pattaya, and Rocky's Boutique Resort names. It is also involved in the development and rental of properties; sale of food and beverages; and provision of human resource outsourcing services. Veranda Resort Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

VRANDA.BK.summary: Veranda Resort Public Company Limited operates hotels and resorts in Thailand. The company operates its facilities under the Veranda Resort and Spa Hua Hin Cha Am, Veranda The High Resort Chiang Mai, Sofitel so Bangkok, Veranda Resort Pattaya, and Rocky's Boutique Resort names. It is also involved in the development and rental of properties; sale of food and beverages; and provision of human resource outsourcing services. Veranda Resort Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

WFS.DE.summary: Warimpex Finanz- und Beteiligungs AG operates as a real estate development and investment company in Central and Eastern Europe. The company operates through Hotels, Investment Properties, and Development and Services segments. It develops, owns, and operates hotel properties; and develops real estate projects, such as office buildings and shopping centres. The company invests in and develops projects in the Czech Republic, Poland, Hungary, Russia, Germany, Austria, and France. As of December 31, 2020, it owned and operated four hotels with 1,000 rooms; and eight commercial and office buildings with a total floor area of approximately 104,600 square meters. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Vienna, Austria.

The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Vienna, Austria.

WH.summary: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, Inc. operates as a hotel franchisor worldwide. It operates through Hotel Franchising and Hotel Management segments. The Hotel Franchising segment licenses its lodging brands and provides related services to third-party hotel owners and others. The Hotel Management segment provides hotel management services for full-service and limited service hotels. It is also involved in the loyalty program business. The company's hotel brand portfolios, including Super 8, Days Inn, Travelodge, Microtel, Howard Johnson, La Quinta, Ramada, Baymont, AmericInn, Wingate, Wyndham Garden, Ramada Encore, Hawthorn, TRYP, Dazzler, Esplendor, Wyndham Grand, Dolce, and Wyndham. As of February 18, 2021, it operated a portfolio of 20 hotel brands with approximately 8,900 hotels with approximately 796,000 rooms in approximately 95 countries. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Parsippany, New Jersey.
